content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I generated an image with a list of top travel destinations mentioned in the text, including Cuba, Hoi An, Chiang Mai, Lanzarote, Vienna, Bucharest, Brussels, and Copenhagen. The image was saved to disk. I requested to browse the website https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions to find out the top attractions in the world. Command browse_website returned the answer gathered from the website: The top attractions in the world, according to Tripadvisor\'s Travelers\' Choice, are Santuario Historico de Machu Picchu in Peru, Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center in Abu Dhabi, St. Peter\'s Basilica in Vatican City, and Angkor Wat in Cambodia. I then used the command "write_to_file" to save the top attractions to a file named "top_attractions.txt".'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "top_attractions.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: The top attractions in the world, according to Tripadvisor's Travelers' Choice, are:\n- Santuario Historico de Machu Picchu in Peru\n- Sheikh Zayed Grand Mosque Center in Abu Dhabi\n- St. Peter's Basilica in Vatican City\n- Angkor Wat in Cambodia"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Machu Picchu"}}}'}]
"""
